data.name: NAME_LENGTH
data.value: Shift name must be between 2 and 100 characters.

data.name: LEAVE_EARLIER_THAN_ARRIVE
data.value: Start time must be earlier than end time.

data.name: GRACE_LATE_ARRIVAL_NEGATIVE
data.value: Grace late arrival must be non-negative.

data.name: GRACE_EARLY_LEAVE_NEGATIVE
data.value: Grace early leave must be non-negative.
